reviews.review_msg: Richard is AMAZING! he makes boring material interesting and he is very caring and helpful. One thing you should be aware of when taking a class with him is the style of his exams. He tests more on technical concepts for example designing a study with some given information. overall he is a great prof and strongly recommended
Richard is the best teacher in the KIN department no doubt too bad the material he teachs isn't so interesting unless you like doing stats. KIN 303/304
Pretty much his lab for KIN 303 is a copyright "That's what she said!" You have something to look forward to for sure! haha

RICHARD IS SO AWESOME!  303 and 304 are essentially the same class, I don't know why they even have them separately?  Easy A for both classes if you pay attention in class and are good with computers.

Richard's overall rating on this website is misleading. He deserves top marks for his teaching/lecturing skills and helpfulness. The material he teaches in both 303 and 304 is a bit dry, but he does what he can to make it interesting and explains it very well. Have to understand the material and apply it during exams.

You cant not love richard. He kinda looks like a plump cocker spaniel. Very personable, tries very hard to make a dull course exciting. SPOILER: he succeeds. Would absolutly take another course with him. Exams are a little vague, but pay attention to what he says in class. Funny stories, funny jokes ect. final is 1/2 open book so keep copious notes
Rich ward gives great advice on time management! Great job Rich! His advice is larger than life

The material is super easy but his marking on exams is weird.  His questions are worth more than there is to write about them which makes it hard to know what he wants....I also felt he favoured athletes
